Notes.Text:
This update for tigervnc fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-26117: Server certificates were stored as certiticate
  authorities, allowing malicious owners of these certificates
  to impersonate any server after a client had added an exception
  (bsc#1176733)

Vulnerabilities.Description: In rfb/CSecurityTLS.cxx and rfb/CSecurityTLS.java in TigerVNC before 1.11.0, viewers mishandle TLS certificate exceptions. They store the certificates as authorities, meaning that the owner of a certificate could impersonate any server after a client had added an exception.
